metadata.title: Anything

ships.title: Ships
ships.shipDescriptionPlaceholder: What kind of ship is this? Please describe briefly
ships.insufficientPermissions: Only Gaia+ users can create ships
ships.transferCaptaincyConfirm: Are you sure you want to transfer captaincy to {name}? You will become a navigator after the transfer.
ships.captainCannotLeave: Captain cannot leave the ship. Please transfer captaincy to another navigator first.
ships.memberOnlyMessageNotLoggedIn: This ship is for members only. You can log in to join.
ships.memberOnlyMessageLoggedIn: This ship is for members only. You can join by clicking the button.
ships.errorLoadingShip: An error occurred while loading ship information.
ships.errorJoiningShip: An error occurred while joining the ship.
ships.confirmLeaveShip: Are you sure you want to leave this ship?
ships.errorLeavingShip: An error occurred while leaving the ship.
ships.confirmDeleteShip: Are you sure you want to delete this ship? This action cannot be undone.
ships.errorDeletingShip: An error occurred while deleting the ship.
ships.errorUpdatingShip: An error occurred while updating the ship.
ships.confirmRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
ships.errorChangingRole: An error occurred while changing member role.
ships.errorRemovingMember: An error occurred while removing the member.
ships.errorTransferringCaptaincy: An error occurred while transferring captaincy.
ships.errorCreatingShip: An error occurred while creating the ship.
